<br><br>

1. Create an example *.Rprofile* file and put in the same directory where a *.Rproj* file lives. Give yourself a personalized greeting message. 
2. Restart R (ctrl + shift + F10 or use Session --> Restart R) and reopen the project. Did your custom message appear?
